CustomField.formula: Factor1__c + IF(ISBLANK(Factor2__c),', ', ', ' + Factor2__c) + IF(ISBLANK(Factor3__c),', ', ', ' + Factor3__c) + IF(ISBLANK(Factor4__c),', ', ', ' + Factor4__c) + IF(ISBLANK(Factor5__c),', ', ', ' + Factor5__c) + IF(ISBLANK(Factor6__c),', ', ', ' + Factor6__c)
CustomField.label: Combined Rule
